data.title: Blood Mountain
data.meta_description: My saviors of rocking metal. This third album should mean the acknowledgement for their quality and creativity after the metalworld-shocking Leviathan. A lot of people want to know if they can deliver yet another masterpiece, others are quite sure another one of their all-time favourites is about to enter their
